lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Rimmer de Vries, chief international economist at Morgan Guaranty Trust Co, said he was very concerned that world economic growth of three to 3-1/2 pct cannot be sustained and that West Germany and Japan wowuld not take up the slack in the world economy that will arise as the U.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Persio Arida, a former director of the Brazizlian central bank who was a key architect of that country's Cruzado plan to curb inflation, said there is an "incentive problem" throughout Latin America.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Mexico is due to sign a 7.7 billion dlr loan on Friday that will be the first major facility under the Baker Plan, which called for net new bank lending between 1986 and 1988, a target that Morris Goldstein of the International Monetary Fund said is now optimistic.
